content: Virtual Grocery Shopping Concierge

A personalized virtual grocery shopping experience tailored to meet customer's needs, preferences and dietary restrictions. Customers can order groceries online and have them delivered to their door or pick them up curb-side.
Personalized grocery lists, Recipe suggestions, Online ordering, Home delivery, Curb-side pickup
Instacart, Amazon Fresh, Walmart Grocery, Shipt, Peapod
Virtual personal shopper
Grocery Subscription Service

A subscription-based service that delivers curated grocery boxes filled with high-quality, locally sourced and organic produce, meats, dairy products and pantry staples directly to customer's doorsteps on a regular basis.
Customizable subscription plans, Local and organic produce, Meats and dairy products, Pantry essentials, Contactless delivery
Imperfect Foods, Misfits Market, Farmbox Direct, ButcherBox, FreshDirect
Sustainable and eco-friendly sourcing
Virtual Grocery Shopping Assistant

A virtual assistant that helps customers save time and hassle of grocery shopping by placing orders for them at their preferred grocery store. Customers simply need to provide their shopping list and the assistant will take care of the rest.
Personalized grocery lists, Online ordering, Budget tracking, Price comparison, Order tracking
AisleFinder, MyShoppingPal, Basket Savings, Google Express, CheckOut Saver
24/7 availability
Shared Grocery Shopping

A community-based platform that connects customers with local shoppers who can purchase and deliver groceries to their doorstep. Customers can choose their preferred shopper based on ratings and reviews and pay a commission fee for the service.
Local shoppers, Community-based platform, Personalized grocery lists, Contactless delivery, Payment tracking
Dumpling, WeGoShop, Shipt, Instacart, TaskRabbit
Human connection and personalized service
pain_point_description: customers are tired of finding themselves in crowded grocery stores, searching for items that may or may not be in stock. they crave an alternative that will save them time, effort and energy
